content.question: Has your {{ divorceWho }} given their consent to a divorce (agreed to it)?

yes.label: Yes
yes.additionalInfo: The court will contact your {{ divorceWho }} and ask them if they agree to a divorce. If you already have their written consent, you have the option of uploading a picture of it later in this application.

no.label: No
no.additionalInfo: You can continue using this reason for divorce, but be aware your {{ divorceWho }} will be asked if they agree to a divorce. If they don’t, you’ll have to pay a fee to change your application.

reasonForDivorceRespondentConsent.required: Select whether your {{ divorceWho }} has given written consent to a divorce or not.

content.question: A yw eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cytuno i ysgaru?

yes.label: Do
yes.additionalInfo: Bydd y llys yn gofyn i'ch {{ divorceWho }} a yw’n cytuno i gael ysgariad. Os ydych eisoes wedi cael cydsyniad ysgrifenedig ganddo/ganddi, gallwch lwytho llun o’r ddogfen yn nes ymlaen wrth gwblhau’r cais hwn.

no.label: Nac oes
no.additionalInfo: Gallwch barhau i ddefnyddio’r rheswm hwn dros ysgaru, ond dylech fod yn ymwybodol y gofynnir i’ch {{ divorceWho }} a yw’n cytuno i ysgaru. Os nad yw’n cytuno, bydd yn rhaid ichi dalu ffi i newid eich cais.

reasonForDivorceRespondentConsent.required: A yw eich {{ divorceWho }} wedi cydsynio’n ysgrifenedig i ysgaru ai peidio?
